Cal students ðŸ“£ Loved your CS 61C professor? Found the workload for UGBA 101A too high? Let your peers know! 

With the RateTime Chrome extension, you can leave anonymous reviews on classes you've taken and read about the experiences of other students who have been through a class you may want to enroll inâ€“all on the Berkeleytime website.

HOW IT WORKS:
1. Install the extension.
2. Sign into your Berkeleytime account. If you haven't signed in before, click the blue "Log in" button in the top right corner of the Berkeleytime website and sign in with your Berkeley email.
3. Navigate to the Berkeleytime class catalog (https://berkeleytime.com/catalog) using Chrome. 
4. Pick a class and scroll down to the new "Reviews" section! Add a review if you've taken the class, or read your peers' reviews. 

RateTime is not affiliated with Berkeleytime or UC Berkeley.
